name: DXC Technology
goal: DXC Technology is the world’s leading independent, end-to-end IT services company helping clients harness the power of innovation to thrive on change. For more than 60 years, we have successfully guided the world’s largest enterprises and government agencies through successful change cycles. DXC Technology has 170.000 employees in more than 70 countries, serving some 6,000 clients.
interests: Enterprise, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Digital Single Market, Data Economy, Cybersecurity, Telecoms & ICT, Digitisation of European Industry, Internet of Things, eGovernment
